casebody.data:
No. 10-1491. Esther Kiobel, Individually and on Behalf of Her Late Husband, Dr. Barinem Kiobel, et al., Petitioners v. Royal Dutch Petroleum Co., et al. 565 U.S. 1188, 132 S. Ct. 1307,

181 L. Ed. 2d 1035,

2012 U.S. LEXIS 1074. February 17, 2012.

Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
